faqs.question: What are the average prices for hotels in Cartagena with infinity pools?
faqs.answer: Prices for hotels in Cartagena with infinity pools can range from $100 to over $300 per night, depending on the season and location. Generally, you will find more affordable options in the off-peak months of May to November. Booking in advance can also help secure better rates.

faqs.question: Which neighborhoods in Cartagena are best for hotels with rooftop infinity pools?
faqs.answer: The best neighborhoods for hotels with rooftop infinity pools are Bocagrande and the historic walled city. Bocagrande offers modern skyscrapers with ocean views, while the walled city has charming colonial architecture. Both areas provide easy access to local attractions and beaches.
